title: Money in the bank
creator_credit: Cyril Randall Productions, Film Producers Guild and Geoffrey Nethercott
brief_description: The theories and workings of banking from sub-branches in small villages to great head offices, showing how banks can serve, help and advise everyone in their various pursuits.
